review:
我第一次对于一个游戏如此失望，这个承载了我无数青春的游戏，就这么走了。
就好像是你和你的女朋友已经相处了6年，本以为直接领证结婚，但是你对象家里的沙币岳父百般阻挠，觉得你配不上他的女儿。并且把你和你对象所孕育的“孩子”-打掉，离开了你。
多年后你原来的岳父事业濒临倒闭，即将被收购，再也没有当年的傲气，偷偷的托人把他的女儿送回到你身边.......
游戏还是那个游戏没有变，但是我想大家应该不会选择做这个苦主吧。
我真的，曾经很喜欢玩这个游戏..........

[h1] Overwatch is trash [/h1]
Just went afk on the screen that forces you to link a battlenet account for 10 mins to write a negative review. 

This company is a sh*t-show. It's evident that there have been challenges within the development and management of the game. Some promised features seemed to fall short, and the game's competitive state suffered, which unfortunately impacted the Overwatch League's viability. The experience at higher ranks was often overshadowed by meta constraints like the GOATS strategy, making gameplay less enjoyable. 

I acknowledge the positive introduction of the ARCADE browser, which brought a fresh breath of air to the updates. However, there seemed to be a strong emphasis on fan service and a traditional battle-pass system, which raised concerns about the pricing of certain cosmetic items. A more balanced approach on the heroes status, ranked system, etc. could have maintained a healthier player base and bolstered the Overwatch League's standing in the world of esports.

It's disheartening to imagine a scenario where players have to pay for access to a new hero, potentially impacting the outcome of matches due to differing hero availability. Game balance should be a priority to ensure fair competition.

In summary, Overwatch has demonstrated both strengths and weaknesses in its journey. While there have been positive changes, there's room for improvement in the way the game is managed and monetized, which could lead to a more enjoyable experience for players and a thriving competitive scene.

For f*ck sake imagine paying to play a new hero that could mean 10% win more because the enemy team didnt paid to unlock that hero in a silly battle-pass.

EDIT: Overwatch still provides enjoyment to those who are new to the experience. Ultimately, we all press the 'play' button on a game as a form of distraction, whether it's a solo endeavor or shared with friends, seeking respite from the outside world.

Activision-Blizzard has re-skinned the dead corpse of Overwatch and is using the poor thing as a means to nickel and dime players through every means possible, complete with psychologically predatory microtransactions. Avoid at all costs.

I am a loyal customer and I wanted to show my loyalty through steam playtime and show Valve where the money really is. Instead of shoveling it out for TF2 cases I went for the PVE. Overwatch 2 is now "out of beta" and I could never want it to be overwatch 1 more. Where is the content I payed for Blizzard? I did not work 27 hours at the leg crushing factory for this

Tenho ~200 horas de jogo e meu hype pro lançamento do 2 estava altissimo. Quando o jogo lançou, vi que estava faltando MUITO conteúdo que já havia no 1. Tiveram algumas mudanças boas e ruins, mas nada que realmente atrapalhasse.

Mas o real problema é ter deixado de ser um jogo pra virar máquina de dinheiro. Virou literalmente pay to win já que tem herói que só comprando agora. Skins recicladas carissímas, sistema de season pass ridiculo, PvE (que era a maior desculpa pra ter o 2 no nome) foi cancelado, e por ai vai...

Realmente massacraram o que já foi um GOTY.

A lot of these reviews are based on judging Blizzard as a whole or TF2 fanboys holding onto a 7 year old grudge. I'll tell you about the game itself.

Overwatch is fun.

At its core, it is still the same PvP game that won hearts and awards in 2016. The characters are great, the gameplay is tight, and there are a lot of ways to enjoy the game.

The PvE is under baked from what was initially promised and they still lock the new hero behind the battle-pass. But for someone just starting out, these really aren't issues. 

My advice, try the game and see if you like it.

이게임을접하기전에저는게임이모두사람들에게즐거움을주는좋은게임이라고생각했습니다.비록어떤게임은만족스럽지못하지만제작자의마음도느낄수있습니다.이게임을접한후에저는제작진이우리게이머에대한악의,메스꺼운쓰레기게임,머리에문제가있는바보한국만이할수있다는것을깊이느꼈습니다.
我们给了你所有，给了你时间爱你，给了你金钱满足你，给了你好评宣传你，曾经我不遗余力地向大家推荐守望先锋，但是现在的你不配得到玩家的信赖与支持，你如同一个恶臭而腐化的池塘，令人厌恶而且避之不及，你终将被钉在游戏史上的耻辱柱上，让世界上剩下的游戏好好看着：那个拿了2016年最佳游戏的网游《守望先锋》，是如何堕落到了如今这个地步，从万人敬仰、推崇备至，变成现在的过街老鼠
傻逼暴雪，你妈死透了

当我在2016年第一次玩到守望先锋的时候，我是那么的快乐
我不懂英雄的玩法，不懂游戏的规则，但我依然沉浸其中；
游戏中的英雄会回应我的期待，游戏中的陌生人会给予我诚挚的善意；
当我放生大笑时，我才明白，原来玩游戏能够那么开心；
当我排位被人夸奖时，我才意识到，原来我也可以被人需要；
我也曾苦练冷门的英雄，努力让他配得上这个团队，当我打出精彩操作被人夸奖时，我是那么的开心，因为那证明了一直以来的努力有了回报；
再后来，随着时间的推移以及平衡的改动，这些快乐正在被逐渐消磨；
英雄的特色被抹去，地图的胜率被固化，玩家的善意在被吞噬；
我还是那么的爱守望先锋，哪怕他宣布不再更新，我还是能跟好友经常休闲玩上几盘；

再后来，ow2出现，它带走了我对ow的最后一丝留念
光污染的特效，没做完的ui，被砍掉的pve，以及为改变而改变的5v5，无不展示着暴雪丑恶的嘴脸；
ow2.他继承了ow1的缺点，放弃了1的优点；
最初为了防止比赛阵容固化做出的改变，导致了阵容更加的固化；
玩家的流失，owl的退出投票，无不展现了ow2的失败。

直到暴雪宣布推出国服时，我才发现我如此平静，原来我早已没有了对ow的热情；
很多人都说没有ow的平替游戏，这点我赞同；
但没有平替，并不代表你不可或缺，你并没有那么重要；
你曾经是个传奇，但看看你现在的样子；
我不再需要你了。
你应得的

Common at-season-launch Blizzard issues aside (like my ultimate bundle not being in my account, even though the transaction went through), I would HIGHLY recommend this game.

There are a lot of easy things that people will nitpick about Overwatch, but before they became too familiar with the game to pick on it like a kid at school, it's often forgotten what magic there truly is here.

The hero variety is like none other, the pacing of matches always leaves you wanting more, and the experience of being able to coordinate with randoms/friends is so satisfying.

Love it or hate it, you know it by name. With Overwatch now being free-to-play, what better time than now to see if you've found your next obsession, like I did all those years ago (I know this is OW2, but let's be real. It's still just OW1 with a better engine).

Overwatch 1 died for this

暴雪工作室不斷脫胎換骨，在此過程中，始終秉持要滿足世界各地玩家的期待，並讓玩家方便取得和暢玩我們的遊戲。希望大家都有機會能與舊雨新知一同體驗遊戲宇宙，同時也不會因遊戲方式而受到限制。

Battle.net 是海納所有 PC 版玩家的大本營，過去幾年以來，我們完善遊戲平台來支援更新的科技功能，並滿足社群玩家的期望。但在我們逐步提升的同時，整個產業也在改變。現在的遊戲生態與二十多年前 Battle.net 剛推出時不同，遊戲不再是為了特定的玩家社群而設計，而是為了廣大的玩家受眾。雖然我們會持續致力於改善與支援 Battle.net，但我們想打破這個藩籬，讓各地玩家都能更容易地體驗與享受我們製作的遊戲。

這也是為什麼我們想嘗試一些新的東西。

我們很高興在此宣布，旗下的幾款遊戲即將登陸 Steam，打頭陣的《鬥陣特攻 2》會在 8 月 11 日（台灣時間）登場！

「暴雪的理念是聆聽玩家的意見，並努力在所有事情上超乎玩家的期待。」暴雪娛樂總裁 Mike Ybarra 說道。「不管是現在還是未來，Battle.net 都是我們的優先考量，但我們知道玩家也想在 Steam 上玩一系列暴雪的遊戲。因此，《鬥陣特攻 2》會在 8 月 11 日（台灣時間）首先登陸 Steam。我們很高興能與 Valve 攜手促成這一成果。」

「玩家與開發者都能從《鬥陣特攻 2》登陸 Steam 這一合作上獲益。」Valve 總裁 Gabe Newell 說道。「玩家可以多一個平台來玩熱愛的遊戲，同時運用 Steam 的各種功能。開發者則能從優秀的暴雪團隊身上獲得幫助，持續完善 Steam 支援《鬥陣特攻 2》的遊戲特色以及功能。」

我們相信作為一款免費暢玩的團隊取向遊戲，《鬥陣特攻 2》會是暴雪挺進 Steam 的最佳選擇。隨著《鬥陣特攻 2》：智械入侵上線，將加入多種遊戲體驗，規模超過這款系列作七年以來的各次改版，其中包括首發 PvE 故事任務、一種全新的核心 PvP 遊戲模式與兩張新地圖，當然還有一位新英雄。對新玩家來說，這是一個體驗《鬥陣特攻》世界的大好機會。

《鬥陣特攻 2》登陸 Steam 並不會影響 Battle.net 玩家，所以一直以來透過 Battle.net 玩遊戲的超讚社群仍可照常遊玩，且無須進行任何調整。Steam 玩家仍需要把《鬥陣特攻 2》連接 Battle.net 帳號，這是我們在所有平台上提供跨平台遊玩及更多功能的必要措施。透過 Steam 玩《鬥陣特攻 2》的玩家可以使用平台的功能，像是 Steam 成就、Steam 的好友清單，以及邀請好友加入遊戲等等。無論你是老玩家或是透過 Steam 加入的新玩家，我們都很期待看到《鬥陣特攻》社群的反應，以及聆聽大家的建議與回饋。

至於未來暴雪在 Steam 上的計畫，我們將擇期公布其他可能會登陸 Steam 平台的遊戲。

《鬥陣特攻 2》Steam 頁面現已上架 ，玩家可以將遊戲加入願望清單！希望《鬥陣特攻》的社群玩家也能給 8 月 11 日（台灣時間）加入遊戲的 Steam 玩家一個熱烈歡迎！

若想獲得暴雪的所有最新消息，別忘了關注我們的 Twitter帳號。

[h1]这个世界需要更多的英雄！[/h1]
[h1]但不需要守望先锋2，和现在的暴雪。[/h1]

    守望先锋预购典藏玩家，当时无不充斥着“暴雪出品，必属精品”的赞美。
    公测那年正好是高考，玩得上瘾。高考前打到了57级，但也考上了心仪的学校。
    大学之后玩的游戏多了，但也会打满每个赛季，每个活动。但是疫情却让我错过了几个赛季、团队的重心放在守望先锋2 PvE 模式以此减少1的大更新，玩的次数也越来越少，但也始终期待着游戏新的到来。

    可是守望先锋2这次的空头支票、战网国服停运，一次又一次伤害中国大陆玩家对暴雪的信任。

    我对守望先锋2这款游戏感到非常失望。守望先锋1给我们带来了独特的英雄射击体验，精美的画面和丰富的角色设定让人难以忘怀。然而，对于守望先锋2，我必须说我感到非常失望。
    守望先锋2开发者取消PvE游戏内容引发玩家的强烈不满和失望。作为一款备受期待的游戏续作，守望先锋2最初宣布将包含丰富的PvE内容，这让玩家们充满期待。然而，开发者宣布取消PvE游戏内容的决定，让许多玩家感到非常失望。
    PvE游戏内容是守望先锋2的一大亮点，是吸引玩家的重要因素之一。然而，开发者取消PvE游戏内容的决定似乎没有充分考虑到玩家的期待和需求，这让玩家们对开发者的决策产生了质疑和不信任。
    什么时候，守望先锋的口碑开始慢慢下滑，最终成了大家的笑柄，唾弃的游戏？
    是Jeff的离开？是新团队在管理和沟通方面存在问题？还是最后Jared说：“团队创造了很多令人惊讶的新东西，但将这些内容整合成一个暴雪品质的体验所需的努力是巨大的。很明显我们无法实现2019年展现出的PvE最初愿景。这意味着我们不会提供带有天赋树的专用英雄模式等内容，这已经不在计划之内了。”

你说的对，但是《守望先锋2》是由司马暴雪自主研发的一款全新开放世界冒险游戏。游戏发生在一个被称作「评论区」的幻想世界，在这里，下载游戏人将被授予「神之嘴」，导引元素之力。你将扮演一位名为「丁真」的神秘角色，在自由的旅行中邂逅性格各异、能力独特的同伴们，和他们一起击败暴雪，找回暴雪死掉的亲人——同时，逐步发掘「差评如潮」的真相..........................................
并且我要指出一下几点：
1.暴雪没有妈妈
2.Blizzard i fxxk you mother b i t c h XD
3.由此可得，为什么暴雪没妈妈，因为我把你妈妈超死了
4.我是你叠傻逼暴雪
5.要是再不给守望先锋差评我可要给三国杀好评了
Have to take my 73 achievements and give this a big thumbs down. OW2 and the developer just aren't what they used to be.

Though overwatch 1 was one of the greatest game which even became IGN's Best PC Games of 2016,however,i mean,the 2nd product of this series ,in the end,turned out to be a failure,a fps game without competitive integrity,a hero-picks based game but has the limitation that you have to pay for these new characters together with the battlepass which is a nonsense

To summarize,Blizzard kept up the masquerade of being creative for many years.If truth be told,the company is not as innovative as it used to be,since the overwatch series now act as an instrument of profit no longer a perfect shooter with charming design,quantities of heroes ,not to mention the best moments in Overwatch League

Sobre o jogo em si, não sei como ta o ranked, mas o casual é divertido pra caramba. Ainda tem personagens e modos que eu preciso desbloquear, mas dos que eu tenho todos tem uma gameplay divertida até
Se é melhor que TF2 ou não, eu não sei dizer objetivamente, mas pessoalmente eu não achei. Tho considere que eu jogo TF2 ja faz anos
Unica coisa merda que eu vou dizer até agora é as missões. Eu não tenho elas, mas pelo que eu vi são só 3 missões e tão cobrando 70 conto por elas. Se fosse pra ser assim era melhor que não tivessem cancelado o modo historia. Bom, vamos ver se a Microsoft vai trazer ele de volta quando a compra finalizar (tomara que sim)
